thread.title: Dona Lerner Golf Academy Inc
thread.title_full: Thread Logic reviewed by Dona Lerner Golf Academy Inc

author: Dona Lerner Golf Academy Inc
title: Dona Lerner Golf Academy Inc
text:
We are always pleased with the quality of the products as well as the quality of the logo work and the attention to detail. For example, our logo has black lettering, but on darker shirts, jackets, backpacks etc your team always make sure we Switch to white lettering so the finished product is clean and serves its purpose of being easy to read. I appreciate that kind of customer service.
We are a small company and cannot buy 100+ shirts, but your offerings are high quality and affordable so we are able to provide nice stuff for our entire team and not break the bank.
Thanks to Jen and the entire team for looking out for our small company's needs.
